page.title: 17FARMING NETT'M & DISTRICT
page.content: NETTLEHAM Mr. Bowser farms 162 acres :-70 wheat,20 barley,20 sugar beet,10 grass,42 oil seed rape,38 bullocks,3 tractors,1 combine,2 trailers,2 balers.Mr. Pickwell farms 650 acres:- 390 wheat,120 winter barley,100 oil seed rape,40 peas,1 combine,2 ploughs, 3 trailers,3 tractors,1 forklift truck,1 baler.Mr. Strawson farms 92 acres:-20 winter barley,72 grasslands, 60 bullocks,200 sheep,2 tractors,1 baler,1 grass mower,3 trailers,1 plough,1 hayturner. SCOTHERN Church Farm 400 acres,Manor Farm 350 acres, Pyewype Farm 200 acres,Wilkinsons Farm 40 acres,all predominately arable SUDBROOKE Turkey Farm,reared in barns for distrib through U.K.Horticulture Scothern Nursery.Farm Machinery Mr.Flint Mr.Clark.
